document.full_text: the national league favorites philadelphia phillies will start the season with top closer brad lidge out for at least three to six weeks with a strained right shoulder, the team said.
document.title: injury sidelines phillies closer lidge until may
lines_and_colors: the national league favorites philadelphia phillies will start the season with top closer brad lidge out for at least three to six weeks with a strained right shoulder, the team said.
